mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NCIIC_TRN_REQUEST( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, REQUEST_CHANNEL, QUERY_MODE, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NO, NAME, MOBILE ) VALUES ( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{trnId,jdbcType = CHAR}, #{requestChannel,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{queryMode,jdbcType = CHAR}, #{certType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{certNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
